app_descript:
App Name: Citytv Video

App Package Name: com.rogers.citytv.phone

Brief: Citytv Video brings the excitement of your favorite Citytv programs straight to your phone! Seamlessly keep up with shows, set alerts for new episodes, log in with your TV provider for more content, and even watch live TV. This user-friendly app makes it effortless to stay connected with the shows you love anytime, anywhere.
